name: elixir
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 10 PP for each move.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This medicine can restore 10 PP to each of the moves that have been learned by a Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This medicine can restore 10 PP to each of the moves that have been learned by a Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This medicine can be used to restore 10 PP to each of the moves that have been learned by a Pokémon.
